oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Franklin Street, Looking East, Clarksville, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color chrome photograph looking down the intersection of Franklin Street and N. First Street in Clarksville. Shops and cars line each side of the street, and a Roxy movie theater is visible on right. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks. Postcard features a white border, divided back, and narrative on reverse. [No. ODK-1467]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson, L.D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Streets; Automobiles; Stores & shops; Motion picture theaters
